entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
